title: In the Footsteps of Lazarus
description: Autobiographical accounting of a near-death experience and of the miraculous healing that I, the author, claim to have had after I was involved in a serious auto accident which left me seriously injured, paralyzed and dying in my car during an ice storm when I was 28 years old. The release date to retail/amazon is Sept.01.2015 but may be purchased prior to release date thru Tate Publishing at https://www.tatepublishing.com/bookst...
author: Dean A.  James
